planDetails.value: NCUA is the independent federal agency that charters and supervises federal credit unions.
NCUA operates the National Credit Union Share Insurance Fund
NCUSIF insures the savings of 80 million account holders.

he Federal Reserve System is comprised of 12 Federal Reserve Banks and 25 Federal Reserve Branches.
